import React, { useEffect } from "react" import randomUsers from "../randomUsers.json" import { FaUserAlt } from "react-icons/fa" import { FaArrowLeft } from "react-icons/fa" export default function(props) { const id = props.match.params.id const person = randomUsers.find(contactId => contactId.id == id) return (

Single View

{person.name.first} {person.name.last}

{person.email}

{person.phone}

{person.location.city}, {person.location.state}

) }
